=== Last Position ===
(row = 13, col = 1)

The last position of the avatar has not changed, indicating that the last action did not produce movement but may have resulted in a rotation. At the current position (row = 13, col = 1), the surrounding tiles are as follows:

- Up (row 12, col 1): Empty (.)
- Down (row 14, col 1): Empty (&)
- Left (row 13, col 0): Wall (&)
- Right (row 13, col 2): Empty (.)

Since the avatar's position hasn’t changed, I'll choose to move right (to the empty cell at (row 13, col 2)) in order to explore further and find collectibles.

``` Action: 3 ``` 
This action should allow me to progress to a new position and potentially discover more opportunities to collect goodies without running into hazards.
